mapper.select: select t1.CONTENT_LABEL_LEVEL ,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME, t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE1,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE2,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE3,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE4,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE5,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE6, t1.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME2,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME3,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME4,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME5,t1.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME6, t1.AUTHOR,t1.OP_TIME,t1.ID,t2.CONTENT_LABEL_NAME CONTENT_LABEL_NAME_RELEVANCE from DIM_IA_CONTENT_LABEL t1 left join DIM_IA_CONTENT_LABEL_RELEVANCE t2 on t1.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE=t2.CONTENT_LABEL_CODE where t1.ID=#{id}
mapper.update:
update DIM_IA_CONTENT_LABEL
CONTENT_LABEL_LEVEL=#{contentLabelLevel},
CONTENT_LABEL_CODE=#{contentLabelCode},
CONTENT_LABEL_CODE1=#{contentLabelCode1},
CONTENT_LABEL_CODE2=#{contentLabelCode2},
CONTENT_LABEL_CODE3=#{contentLabelCode3},
CONTENT_LABEL_CODE4=#{contentLabelCode4},
CONTENT_LABEL_CODE5=#{contentLabelCode5},
CONTENT_LABEL_CODE6=#{contentLabelCode6},
CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1=#{contentLabelName1Param},
CONTENT_LABEL_NAME2=#{contentLabelName2},
CONTENT_LABEL_NAME3=#{contentLabelName3},
CONTENT_LABEL_NAME4=#{contentLabelName4},
CONTENT_LABEL_NAME5=#{contentLabelName5},
CONTENT_LABEL_NAME6=#{contentLabelName6},
AUTHOR=#{author},
OP_TIME=#{opTime},
where ID=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
distinct CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE1
distinct CONTENT_LABEL_NAME2,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE2
distinct CONTENT_LABEL_NAME3,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE3
distinct CONTENT_LABEL_NAME4,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE4
distinct CONTENT_LABEL_NAME5,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE5
FROM DIM_IA_CONTENT_LABEL where 1=1
and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1=#{contentLabelName1} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME3 is null
and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1=#{contentLabelName1} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME2=#{contentLabelName2} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME4 is null
and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1=#{contentLabelName1} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME2=#{contentLabelName2} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME3=#{contentLabelName3} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME5 is null
and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1=#{contentLabelName1} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME2=#{contentLabelName2} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME3=#{contentLabelName3} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME4=#{contentLabelName4} and CONTENT_LABEL_NAME6 is null

insert.if:
insert all
into DIM_IA_CONTENT_LABEL (CONTENT_LABEL_LEVEL ,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE,CONTENT_LABEL_NAME, CONTENT_LABEL_CODE1,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE2,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE3,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE4,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE5,CONTENT_LABEL_CODE6, CONTENT_LABEL_NAME1,CONTENT_LABEL_NAME2,CONTENT_LABEL_NAME3,CONTENT_LABEL_NAME4,CONTENT_LABEL_NAME5,CONTENT_LABEL_NAME6, AUTHOR,OP_TIME,ID) values (#{data.contentLabelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.contentLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.contentLabelCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelCode3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.contentLabelCode4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelCode5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelCode6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.contentLabelName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelName3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.contentLabelName4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelName5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{data.contentLabelName5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.opTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.id,jdbcType=DATE})
select 1 from dual

mapper.select: SELECT concat(CONTENT_LABEL_CODE,concat('~',CONTENT_LABEL_NAME)) FROM DIM_IA_CONTENT_LABEL order by OP_TIME desc
